00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Name: CreateOutputWindow()
00032 // Desc: Create a new output window by creating a new device (first window or fullscreen mode) or copying the existing one (windowed mode)
00033 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 Result Direct3D10::CreateOutputWindow(const OutputSettings* settings, int screenidx)
00035 {
00036         Result rlt;
00037 
00038         // Adjust size
00039         Size<DWORD> backbuffersize;
00040         if(isfullscreen)
00041                 backbuffersize = settings->backbuffersize;
00042         else
00043         {
00044                 RECT clientrect;
00045                 if(GetClientRect(settings->wnd, &clientrect))
00046                 {
00047                         backbuffersize.width = clientrect.right - clientrect.left;
00048                         backbuffersize.height = clientrect.bottom - clientrect.top;
00049                 }
00050         }
00051 
00052         OutputWindow10* newwnd;
00053         CHKALLOC(newwnd = new OutputWindow10());
00054         if(numwnds == 0 || isfullscreen)
00055         {
00056                 // First window or fullscreen mode
00057                 IFFAILED(newwnd->CreateDevice(backbuffersize, settings->wnd, screenidx, settings->enablemultisampling))
00058                 {
00059                         REMOVE(newwnd);
00060                         return rlt;
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         else
00064         {
00065                 // Windowed mode
00066                 IFFAILED(newwnd->AdoptDevice(dxgifty, backbuffersize, settings->wnd, wnds[0]))
00067                 {
00068                         REMOVE(newwnd);
00069                         return rlt;
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 
00073         CHKALLOC(wnds = (OutputWindow10**)realloc(wnds, (numwnds + 1) * sizeof(OutputWindow10*)));
00074         wnds[numwnds++] = newwnd;
00075 
00076         return R_OK;
00077 }
00078 
00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 // Name: ReleaseDerived()
00081 // Desc: Destructor replacement (destructors can't be overloaded)
00082 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 void Direct3D10::ReleaseDerived()
00084 {
00085         for(int i = 0; i < numwnds; i++)
00086                 REMOVE(wnds[i])
00087         REMOVE_ARRAY(wnds)
00088         numwnds = 0;
00089 
00090         RELEASE(dxgifty)
00091 }
